title: Member Preview: David Hockney: The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020

short_description: Enjoy a full day of member-only access to David Hockney: The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020 and see the exhibition before it opens to the public.
list_description: Enjoy a full day of member-only access to David Hockney: The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020 and see the exhibition before it opens to the public.
description:
Enjoy a full day of member-only access to David Hockney: The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020.

Two years ago—at the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic—the ever-versatile and inventive artist David Hockney traveled to France with the express intention of capturing the arrival of spring. There, he used the medium of the iPad to create The Arrival of Spring, Normandy, 2020, a series of works that are a celebration of the joy of the natural world.

Simply show your member card or digital member card to enter. See more member programs.
